quotes.quote: Brothers and sisters are one of the constant things in the lives of many people.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: There is no love like the love for a brother. There is no love like the love from a brother.
Because brothers don't let each other wander in the dark alone.
Friendship: the relationship you have with your chosen family, the brothers and sisters of your heart.
I have a wonderful shelter, which is my family. I have a wonderful relationship with my brother and sister; this makes me feel that I know always where I belong.
quotes.author: Jose Carreras

quotes.quote: I think people that have a brother or sister don't realize how lucky they are. Sure, they fight a lot, but to know that there's always somebody there, somebody that's family.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for a difficult time.
Once a brother, always a brother, no matter the distance, no matter the difference and no matter the issue.
My family is everything. I am what I am thanks to my mother, my father, my brother, my sister... because they have given me everything. The education I have is thanks to them.
quotes.author: Ronaldinho

quotes.quote: Brothers aren't simply close; brothers are knit together.
quotes.author: Robert Rivers

quotes.quote: My brother is worth a thousand of your friend.
